name: Tap Reborn
description:
Are you ready to dash through a new level of rhythm games?

Greatest EDM and top hits of famous singers and DJs such as Justin Bieber, Hardwell, Avicii, Calvin Harris, Adam Lambert, etc. can be found in this game in form of EXTRACTS.

This rhythm game extends your music enjoyment to another sense: touch by challenging users to show them your finger skill and music perception.
- Feel the music with your fingers: tap the notes as they dash
the scoring areas
- Updated list of songs of different genres: EDM, techno, Metal, etc. The list of songs is chosen and updated weekly.
- Conquer all the challenges
- Be the top of leaderboard

Are you ready to tap and become the next music hero?

The extracts used in the game is a small portion of the EDM songs which aims to introduce the new EDM songs and allow users to experience the new EDM songs under game environment, which is under fair use (http://copyright.gov/fair-use/more-info.html)

Enjoy!
